::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/load-data-pkgs_cf89cb95249bf05ff088ce25e4c4ff83'}

```{.r .cell-code}
safi_data <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-06-13/safi_data.csv')

library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/skim-data_51d4682ec6c67da649c0103806fefd0a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
skim(safi_data)
```

:::


For the data skim, we see that the three different villages in the dataset. Let's see how the number of members in a household differ among the villages.


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_c14a583eb4319204cd68efb8d33333ae'}

```{.r .cell-code}
safi_data %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = factor(village))) +
  geom_bar()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
